title: Title of work deciphered in sealed Herculaneum scroll via digital unwrapping
summary:
Researchers, through the Vesuvius Challenge, have successfully deciphered the title of a sealed Herculaneum scroll, PHerc. 172, using digital unwrapping techniques. The scroll, housed at the Bodleian Libraries at the University of Oxford, is identified as "On Vices" by the Greek philosopher Philodemus, an ethical treatise providing guidance for a virtuous life. This achievement earned the researchers the Vesuvius Challenge First Title Prize of $60,000.

After the scroll was scanned at the Diamond Light Source, the data was released publicly. Sean Johnson and a research team of Marcel Roth and Micha Nowak independently discovered the title page within the innermost part of the scroll. Their findings were confirmed by the Vesuvius Challenge papyrological team.

Philodemus, an Epicurean philosopher, advocated for pleasure as central to a good life. He is a major author represented in the Villa of Papyri at Herculaneum. While the author and title are known, the book number within the "On Vices" series is still under investigation, with possibilities ranging from Book 1 to Book 4.

Experts like Michael McOsker highlight the importance of this discovery for understanding Philodemus' ethical views and the "On Vices" series as a whole. Richard Ovenden emphasizes the potential of AI to transform arts and humanities scholarship and revitalize ancient artifacts. The Vesuvius Challenge continues to encourage researchers to contribute to deciphering the scrolls.
chinese_title: 通过数字解卷破译赫库兰尼姆封印卷轴作品标题
chinese_summary:

在卷轴于钻石光源完成扫描后，数据被公开发布。肖恩·约翰逊以及马塞尔·罗斯和米哈·诺瓦克的科研团队独立发现了卷轴最内部的标题页。他们的发现得到了维苏威挑战赛纸莎草纸学团队的证实。

菲洛德谟是一位伊壁鸠鲁派哲学家，主张快乐是美好生活的核心。他是赫库兰尼姆纸莎草别墅中一位重要的代表作家。虽然作者和标题已知，但《论恶习》系列中的卷号仍在调查中，可能性范围从第一卷到第四卷。

迈克尔·麦克斯科等专家强调了这项发现对于理解菲洛德谟的伦理观点以及整个《论恶习》系列的重要性。理查德·欧文登强调了人工智能在改变艺术和人文学科研究以及复兴古代文物方面的潜力。维苏威挑战赛将继续鼓励研究人员为解读这些卷轴做出贡献。

title: Gonzalo Guerrero
summary:
Gonzalo Guerrero was a Spanish sailor who was shipwrecked off the Yucatán Peninsula in 1511 and enslaved by the Maya. Over time, he assimilated into their culture, learned their language, and became a respected warrior. He married a Mayan woman, Zazil Ha, and had three children with her, who are considered among the first mestizos in the Americas.

In 1519, Hernán Cortés invited Guerrero to join his conquest of Mexico. However, Guerrero declined, citing his commitment to his family and his loyalty to the Mayan governor, for whom he was a soldier and advisor. He defended the Mayan territories against Spanish incursions.

Guerrero played a key role in resisting Spanish attempts to conquer the Yucatán, including the entradas of Francisco de Montejo and Alonso de Avila. He died in 1536 during a battle against Pedro de Alvarado's forces in Honduras, fighting alongside the Mayan people.

Guerrero's story has evolved over time, from being seen as a traitor by the Spanish to becoming a symbol of the blending of cultures in Mexico. He is remembered as a figure who chose to embrace a new identity and defend his adopted people. His life has been explored in numerous books, novels, and other forms of media.

title: Writing an LLM from scratch, part 13 – attention heads are dumb
summary:
In "Writing an LLM from scratch, part 13," Giles delves into the "why" behind self-attention in Large Language Models (LLMs), specifically addressing why the matrix multiplications work as intended. The core argument is that individual attention heads are much simpler and "dumber" than one might initially think. Their power arises from the combination of multi-head attention and the layering of multiple attention blocks.

The article explains that each attention head doesn't necessarily grasp the rich contextual meaning of a token in a sentence. Instead, it performs simple pattern matching. Multiple layers allow for progressively more complex representations to be built, similar to how CNNs detect increasingly sophisticated features in images.

Giles contrasts the attention mechanism with older RNNs that suffered from a fixed-length bottleneck, limiting their ability to process long sequences. Attention, with its layer-wise enrichment of context vectors, scales better with input length.

The article then uses an example of an imaginary attention head that matches articles to nouns. It explains how input embeddings are projected into a simplified "query space" and "key space." These spaces represent simplified features that the head is looking for (query) and what a token actually is (key). A dot product then measures the similarity between the query and key vectors, determining attention scores. Value space can be much richer in the real world.

In essence, attention heads are individually performing simple pattern recognition, but when combined in multi-head configurations across multiple layers, they create the sophisticated language understanding capabilities of LLMs.
chinese_title: 从零开始编写LLM，第13部分 – 注意力头很笨
chinese_summary:
从零编写LLM，第13部分：Giles深入探讨大型语言模型(LLM)中自注意力机制背后的“原因”，特别解释了矩阵乘法为何能按预期工作。核心论点是，单个注意力头比人们最初想象的要简单得多且更“笨”。它们的力量源于多头注意力的组合以及多个注意力块的堆叠。

文章解释说，每个注意力头不一定能掌握句子中token的丰富上下文含义。相反，它执行简单的模式匹配。多层结构允许构建逐渐复杂的表示，类似于CNN如何在图像中检测越来越复杂的功能。

Giles将注意力机制与旧式的RNN进行了对比，后者受限于固定长度的瓶颈，限制了它们处理长序列的能力。注意力机制通过逐层丰富上下文向量，可以更好地随输入长度进行缩放。

文章随后使用了一个假想的注意力头的例子，该注意力头将冠词与名词进行匹配。它解释了如何将输入嵌入投影到简化的“查询空间”和“键空间”中。这些空间代表了注意力头正在寻找的简化特征（查询）以及token实际是什么（键）。然后，点积测量查询向量和键向量之间的相似性，从而确定注意力分数。在现实世界中，值空间可能要丰富得多。

本质上，注意力头单独执行简单的模式识别，但当在多头配置中跨多个层组合时，它们会创造LLM复杂的语言理解能力。

title: The Epochalypse Project
summary:
The Epochalypse Project highlights the looming threat of the 32-bit timestamp vulnerability, also known as the Year 2038 problem, which will cause widespread disruptions in computer systems relying on Unix time after January 19, 2038. This vulnerability, affecting systems from hospital equipment to power grids, stems from the limitation of a 32-bit integer counting seconds since 1970, leading to a rollover to negative numbers and misinterpretation of dates.

The article argues that the scale of this problem is greater than Y2K due to the increased number of embedded systems, our dependence on digital infrastructure, and the possibility of remote exploitation via unsecured time protocols. If unaddressed, this could result in significant failures across various sectors, from banking to transportation, potentially endangering lives and disrupting economies.

Founded by cybersecurity researchers Trey Darley and Pedro Umbelino, The Epochalypse Project aims to coordinate a global response through standardized testing, documentation of vulnerabilities, development of remediation strategies, and knowledge sharing. The article emphasizes the urgency of the situation and encourages everyone, from the general public to industry professionals and government entities, to participate in testing, reporting, and developing solutions. It provides specific action steps for each group, including testing devices, incorporating timestamp vulnerability compliance into products, and creating regulatory frameworks. The project serves as a central hub for sharing findings and fostering collaboration to mitigate the potential digital disaster.

Epochalypse项目由网络安全研究员Trey Darley和Pedro Umbelino创立，旨在通过标准化测试、漏洞记录、补救策略制定和知识共享来协调全球应对。文章强调了情况的紧迫性，并鼓励从普通大众到行业专业人士和政府实体等所有人参与测试、报告和开发解决方案。它为每个群体提供了具体的行动步骤，包括测试设备、将时间戳漏洞合规性纳入产品以及创建监管框架。该项目作为共享发现和促进协作的中心枢纽，旨在减轻潜在的数字灾难。

title: Show HN: GlassFlow – OSS streaming dedup and joins from Kafka to ClickHouse
summary:
GlassFlow is an open-source real-time stream processor designed to simplify data pipeline creation and management between Kafka and ClickHouse. It provides a user-friendly web interface for building and managing real-time data pipelines, featuring built-in support for deduplication and temporal joins. Targeted at data engineers, GlassFlow handles late-arriving events, ensures exactly-once correctness, and scales with high-throughput data.

Key features include:

*   **Streaming Deduplication:** Real-time deduplication of Kafka streams with configurable time windows.
*   **Temporal Stream Joins:** Real-time joining of two Kafka streams with configurable time windows.
*   **Built-in Kafka Connector:** Seamless integration with Kafka using NATS-Kafka Bridge.
*   **Optimized ClickHouse Sink:** Native ClickHouse connection with configurable batch sizes and retry mechanisms.
*   **User-Friendly Interface:** Web-based UI for pipeline configuration and management.

The tool provides a local development setup using Docker Compose and includes a demo with local Kafka and ClickHouse instances. The GlassFlow API is written in Go, and the architecture includes a NATS message broker. Pipeline configurations are defined in JSON and encompass source (Kafka), sink (ClickHouse), and optional join configurations. GlassFlow is licensed under Apache License 2.0, and contributions are welcomed.

title: A Rust Documentation Ecosystem Review
summary:
This article reviews the Rust documentation ecosystem, focusing on comprehensiveness, discoverability, philosophy, and approachability. It introduces the Diátaxis system, which categorizes documentation into four quadrants: tutorials, how-to guides, references, and explanations.

*   **Tutorials:** Beginner-friendly, focusing on practical learning by doing. They lack comprehensiveness but excel in discoverability and approachability.
*   **How-to Guides:** Aimed at users with basic competence, they address real-world problems. More comprehensive than tutorials, offering greater discoverability but less approachability.
*   **References:** Maximally comprehensive, providing detailed descriptions of each item. However, they lack philosophy, discoverability, and approachability.
*   **Explanations:** Rare but valuable, explaining the reasoning behind design choices. They enhance discoverability, comprehensiveness, and philosophy.

The article then surveys the documentation of various popular Rust crates, evaluating their adherence to the four quadrants and the author's criteria. This includes libraries like `rand`, `axum`, `bevy`, `tokio`, and others. The goal is to assess whether the Rust ecosystem's documentation meets expectations for quality and usefulness, particularly in terms of teaching beginners and helping experts remember crucial information. The article emphasizes that good documentation should not only explain *what* the code does but also *why* it was designed that way.
chinese_title: Rust 文档生态系统概览
chinese_summary:
本文回顾了 Rust 文档生态系统，重点关注其全面性、可发现性、理念性和可接近性。文章介绍了 Diátaxis 系统，该系统将文档分为四个象限：教程、操作指南、参考和解释。

*   **教程：** 适合初学者，侧重于通过实践进行学习。它们缺乏全面性，但在可发现性和可接近性方面表现出色。
*   **操作指南：** 针对具有基本能力的用户，解决现实世界的问题。比教程更全面，提供更高的可发现性，但可接近性较低。
*   **参考：** 最大限度地全面，提供每个项目的详细描述。然而，它们缺乏理念性、可发现性和可接近性。
*   **解释：** 稀有但有价值，解释设计选择背后的原因。它们增强了可发现性、全面性和理念性。

随后，本文调查了各种流行的 Rust crate 的文档，评估它们对四个象限以及作者标准的遵守情况。这包括 `rand`、`axum`、`bevy`、`tokio` 等库。目的是评估 Rust 生态系统的文档是否满足对质量和实用性的期望，尤其是在教授初学者和帮助专家记住关键信息方面。本文强调，好的文档不仅应该解释代码*做什么*，还应该解释*为什么*这样设计。

title: DNS Piracy Blocking Orders: Google, Cloudflare, and OpenDNS Respond Differently
summary:
This article discusses the increasing trend of courts ordering DNS resolvers like OpenDNS, Cloudflare, and Google to block access to pirate websites, a move aimed at circumventing ISP-level blocks. Rightsholders are targeting public DNS resolvers because they are used to bypass blocking measures. The article highlights the different approaches these companies are taking in response to these legal orders.

OpenDNS (Cisco) has chosen the most drastic measure, withdrawing its service entirely from countries where blocking orders are in place, like France and Belgium. Cloudflare, on the other hand, complies but claims to use "alternate mechanisms" rather than directly blocking through its public DNS resolver. Users accessing blocked domains through Cloudflare DNS receive an HTTP 451 error, and the block is logged in the Lumen Database. Google’s response is the least transparent. Its public DNS resolver (8.8.8.8) simply refuses the DNS query for blocked domains, resulting in a generic browser error for users with no indication that the site is blocked.

The article emphasizes that Google's approach lacks transparency and might violate the Belgian court's requirement for redirection to a dedicated information page. The author argues that transparency is crucial when interfering with DNS, particularly as similar site-blocking proposals involving public DNS resolvers are being considered in the United States. The different responses highlight the complexities and challenges of implementing DNS-level blocking orders, raising concerns about transparency and user awareness.
chinese_title: DNS盗版封锁令：谷歌、Cloudflare和OpenDNS的不同回应
chinese_summary:
法院命令OpenDNS、Cloudflare和谷歌等DNS解析器屏蔽盗版网站访问的趋势日益增长，此举旨在规避ISP层面的屏蔽。版权所有者正瞄准公共DNS解析器，因为它们被用于绕过屏蔽措施。本文重点介绍了这些公司针对这些法律命令采取的不同应对方法。

OpenDNS（思科）选择了最激烈的措施，完全从法国和比利时等实施屏蔽命令的国家撤回其服务。另一方面，Cloudflare虽然遵守规定，但声称使用“替代机制”，而不是通过其公共DNS解析器直接屏蔽。通过Cloudflare DNS访问被屏蔽域名的用户会收到HTTP 451错误，并且该屏蔽会被记录在Lumen数据库中。谷歌的反应最不透明。其公共DNS解析器（8.8.8.8）只是拒绝被屏蔽域名的DNS查询，导致用户出现通用的浏览器错误，而没有迹象表明该网站被屏蔽。

本文强调谷歌的做法缺乏透明度，并可能违反比利时法院要求重定向到专用信息页面的规定。作者认为，干预DNS时透明度至关重要，特别是因为美国也在考虑涉及公共DNS解析器的类似网站屏蔽提案。不同的应对措施突显了实施DNS层面屏蔽命令的复杂性和挑战，引发了对透明度和用户知情权的担忧。

title: Plain Vanilla Web – Guide for de-frameworking yourself
summary:
This article, titled "Plain Vanilla Web – Guide for de-frameworking yourself," introduces an approach to web development that avoids frameworks, build tools, and server-side logic in favor of leveraging core web standards. It advocates for building websites and web applications using only an editor, a browser, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

The core techniques covered include:

*   **Components:** Using Web Components to create reusable building blocks, replacing the component-based approach of frameworks like React or Vue.
*   **Styling:** Utilizing modern CSS features to replicate the functionality of CSS Modules, PostCSS, and SASS.
*   **Sites:** Developing and deploying web projects based on Web Components without build tools, frameworks, or server-side logic.
*   **Applications:** Building single-page applications (SPAs) with vanilla JavaScript, covering routing and state management.

The guide targets developers already familiar with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. While acknowledging the power and speed offered by frameworks, the article argues that the complexity and maintenance overhead of frameworks can be avoided by adopting the "plain vanilla" approach. This trade-off prioritizes simplicity, zero-maintenance, and leverages the strong web standards support found in modern browsers. The next step is to learn about building components.
chinese_title: 纯粹原生Web - 摆脱框架指南
chinese_summary:
本文题为“原生Web：摆脱框架指南”，介绍了一种Web开发方法，该方法避免使用框架、构建工具和服务器端逻辑，而倾向于利用核心Web标准。它提倡仅使用编辑器、浏览器、HTML、CSS和JavaScript来构建网站和Web应用程序。

涵盖的核心技术包括：

*   **组件：** 使用Web Components创建可重用的构建块，取代React或Vue等框架的基于组件的方法。
*   **样式：** 利用现代CSS特性来复制CSS Modules、PostCSS和SASS的功能。
*   **站点：** 开发和部署基于Web Components的Web项目，无需构建工具、框架或服务器端逻辑。
*   **应用程序：** 使用原生JavaScript构建单页应用程序(SPA)，涵盖路由和状态管理。

该指南面向已经熟悉HTML、CSS和JavaScript的开发人员。文章承认框架提供的强大功能和速度，但也认为采用“原生”方法可以避免框架的复杂性和维护负担。这种权衡方案优先考虑简单性、零维护，并利用现代浏览器中强大的Web标准支持。下一步是学习构建组件。

title: JEP 515: Ahead-of-Time Method Profiling
summary:
JEP 515 proposes "Ahead-of-Time Method Profiling" to improve Java application startup and warmup times. It aims to make method execution profiles from a previous "training run" instantly available when the HotSpot JVM starts. This allows the JIT compiler to generate optimized native code immediately, rather than waiting to collect profiles during the application's early runtime.

The key goals are to accelerate application warmup, avoid code changes, and integrate with existing AOT cache workflows (JEP 483). The motivation stems from the need to identify and optimize "hot methods" (CPU-intensive methods) quickly. Currently, the JVM collects profiles during the application's warmup period, causing performance lags. JEP 515 shifts this profiling to a training run, storing the profiles in the AOT cache for use during production.

This approach doesn't replace online profiling or JIT compilation, but rather enhances them. The JIT compiler still adapts to real-time behavior, using the AOT profiles to initiate optimization earlier and more accurately. The example provided shows a 19% performance improvement with a small overhead in AOT cache size.

The proposal emphasizes the synergistic relationship between AOT profiling and eventual AOT compilation. Testing includes unit tests and integration with existing AOT cache tests. The risk assessment builds upon that of JEP 483, assuming that training runs provide valuable insights for production performance.
chinese_title: JEP 515：提前编译方法分析
chinese_summary:
JEP 515 提议“提前方法分析”，以改善 Java 应用程序的启动和预热时间。其目标是在 HotSpot JVM 启动时，立即提供先前“训练运行”中的方法执行概要信息。这使得 JIT 编译器能够立即生成优化的本机代码，而无需等待在应用程序的早期运行时收集概要信息。

关键目标是加速应用程序预热，避免代码更改，并与现有的 AOT 缓存工作流程（JEP 483）集成。其动机源于需要快速识别和优化“热方法”（CPU 密集型方法）。目前，JVM 在应用程序的预热期间收集概要信息，导致性能滞后。JEP 515 将此分析转移到训练运行中，并将概要信息存储在 AOT 缓存中，以便在生产期间使用。

这种方法不会取代在线分析或 JIT 编译，而是增强它们。JIT 编译器仍然会适应实时行为，使用 AOT 概要信息来更早、更准确地启动优化。提供的示例显示，AOT 缓存大小略有增加，性能提高了 19%。

该提案强调了 AOT 分析和最终 AOT 编译之间的协同关系。测试包括单元测试以及与现有 AOT 缓存测试的集成。风险评估基于 JEP 483，假设训练运行为生产性能提供有价值的见解。

title: Leaving Google
summary:
Ian Lance Taylor, a key contributor to the Go programming language, announces his departure from Google after 19 years. He joined the Go team in 2008, working alongside renowned programmers like Rob Pike, Ken Thompson, and Robert Griesemer. Taylor expresses astonishment at Go's widespread adoption, exceeding initial expectations.

His contributions included developing a Go frontend for the GCC compiler, adding Go support to Google's build system and SWIG, managing the team for a period, and contributing to the implementation of generics in Go 1.18 with Robert Griesemer.

Taylor reflects on his role, acknowledging his strength in addressing immediate and future problems but also admitting a slowness in recognizing ideas that would enable programmers to achieve entirely new things. He believes his approach was beneficial for Go's success, but states that changes within Google and the Go project, coupled with the evolving programming landscape, have led him to conclude that he is no longer a good fit.

Despite leaving Google, Taylor remains interested in Go's future. He believes programming languages must evolve to survive, particularly those with extensive standard libraries. He plans to take a break but hopes to contribute to Go again in the future.

title: An Introduction to Solid Queue for Ruby on Rails
summary:
This article introduces Solid Queue, a new background job processing library in Rails 8, and explains why it was created. Solid Queue's primary selling point is that it eliminates the need for additional infrastructure dependencies like Redis, relying solely on the database.

The article highlights the key components: Jobs (ActiveRecord models) and Workers (processes that execute jobs). It explains how jobs are enqueued, executed, and managed using multiple database tables, including `solid_queue_jobs`, `solid_queue_ready_executions`, `solid_queue_claimed_executions`, and `solid_queue_processes`.

The article emphasizes Solid Queue's performance and safety features. It discusses how `solid_queue_ready_executions` improves performance by providing a smaller table for workers to poll. It also explains the importance of `FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED` in modern databases for concurrent polling. The article explains how `solid_queue_claimed_executions` and `solid_queue_processes`, along with a supervisor process, prevent jobs from being lost if a worker crashes. The supervisor monitors worker processes and re-queues jobs claimed by deceased workers.

title: How to (actually) prove it – New Frontiers of Mathematics and Computing in Lean
summary:
This article highlights the exciting new frontier of mathematics and computing emerging from the use of the Lean Theorem prover by prominent mathematicians. It focuses on the "Lean Blueprints" tool, a graph-based mechanism used by mathematicians to plan and track the formalization of mathematical results. The blueprint visualizes the progress of definitions, lemmas, and theorems, showing their status (unwritten, stated, proven) over time.

The author argues that these blueprints, coupled with version control, provide unprecedented access to the thought processes and strategies mathematicians employ when proving theorems. By analyzing the evolution of these blueprints, researchers can gain insights into how mathematicians conjecture lemmas, tackle problems, and build complex proofs.

The article showcases animations illustrating the evolution of Lean Blueprints for several active formalization projects, including the Polynomial Freiman Ruzsa conjecture, the Kelley-Meka bound on Roth numbers, and Carleson's theorem. The visualizations reveal patterns in development, such as bursts of activity where mathematicians sketch out large portions of a proof, followed by periods of verification.

The author concludes by presenting visualizations for other projects, observing different development patterns and highlighting the unique nature of projects aiming to develop new mathematics within Lean itself. The article encourages readers to explore the author's code for extracting and visualizing blueprint data, emphasizing the potential for new tools and techniques, including ML models, to aid mathematicians in proving theorems.
chinese_title: 如何在 Lean 中（真正）证明它 —— 数学和计算的新前沿

本文重点介绍了著名数学家使用Lean定理证明器所涌现出的数学和计算领域令人兴奋的新前沿。文章聚焦于“Lean Blueprints”工具，这是一种基于图的机制，数学家们利用它来规划和跟踪数学结果的形式化过程。蓝图可视化定义、引理和定理的进度，显示它们随时间的状态（未编写、已声明、已证明）。

作者认为，这些蓝图与版本控制相结合，以前所未有的方式揭示了数学家在证明定理时所采用的思维过程和策略。通过分析这些蓝图的演变，研究人员可以深入了解数学家如何推测引理、解决问题和构建复杂的证明。

文章展示了若干活跃形式化项目的Lean Blueprints演变动画，包括Polynomial Freiman Ruzsa猜想、Roth数的Kelley-Meka界限以及Carleson定理。这些可视化揭示了开发模式，例如数学家们勾勒出大部分证明的大量活动爆发，随后是验证期。

作者最后展示了其他项目的可视化，观察到不同的开发模式，并强调了旨在在Lean本身内部开发新数学的项目的独特性质。文章鼓励读者探索作者用于提取和可视化蓝图数据的代码，强调了新工具和技术的潜力，包括ML模型，以帮助数学家证明定理。

title: In 2025, venture capital can't pretend everything is fine any more
summary:
This article paints a bleak picture of the venture capital landscape in early 2025, arguing that the industry is struggling and desperately clinging to AI as its last hope. The Pitchbook-NVCA Venture Monitor for Q1 2025 reveals a moribund VC market, propped up almost entirely by OpenAI-related deals, fueled by FOMO and a belief in the "marketing brochure version of AI."

The author contends that Trump's tariffs have exacerbated existing problems, primarily the industry's inability to adapt to the end of zero-interest rates. The previous era of cheap money led to reckless investments in unsustainable businesses, and now that money is scarce, VCs are struggling to generate returns.

Outside of AI, early-stage startups are struggling to attract funding, and even funded companies are being acquired prematurely. A key problem is the inability of startups to "cash out" through IPOs or acquisitions, leaving investors without returns and hindering new investment. The author criticizes the industry's reliance on inflated valuations and its failure to acknowledge the underlying problems.

Ultimately, the article portrays the VC industry as clueless and out of its depth, lacking a coherent plan for the future beyond hoping for market recovery and a change in Trump's policies. The author highlights the naivete of some VCs, pointing to their association with controversial figures and movements as evidence of poor judgment. The author concludes with a sense of schadenfreude, noting the VC class's discomfort while the rest of the world faces more significant challenges.

title: Four years of running a SaaS in a competitive market
summary:
Max Rozen shares his experiences over four years of running OnlineOrNot, a self-funded SaaS in a competitive market. He emphasizes core principles that have remained constant: dedicating two hours every workday, avoiding side projects to focus efforts, solving customer pain, and being ruthlessly iterative.

Rozen highlights key lessons learned, including the importance of starting to build quickly after minimal research, prioritizing solving customer pain over pushing subscriptions, shipping small and often, and focusing on early-stage functionality rather than immediate scalability. He advises having an early-access program for feature testing and implementing a free trial as soon as possible to showcase the product's value.

He also stresses the importance of comprehensive documentation, optimizing for mobile, and understanding customer acquisition channels. Rozen cautions against invasive analytics and emphasizes the value of direct customer communication. A significant portion of development time is spent on the SaaS platform's infrastructure rather than the core problem itself. Pricing requires experimentation, and MRR isn't a reliable immediate metric for success. Instead, focus on usage metrics. Finally, he advises against offering "unlimited" anything.

罗森强调了重要的经验教训，包括在最少的研究后快速开始构建，优先解决客户痛点而非推广订阅，小步快跑地发布，以及专注于早期功能而非立即扩展。他建议设立早期访问计划进行功能测试，并尽快实施免费试用以展示产品的价值。

他还强调了全面文档的重要性，针对移动设备进行优化，以及了解客户获取渠道。 罗森警告不要进行侵入式分析，并强调直接客户沟通的价值。 大部分开发时间都花在了SaaS平台的基础设施上，而不是核心问题本身。 定价需要实验，MRR并不是衡量成功的可靠即时指标。 相反，应关注使用指标。 最后，他建议不要提供任何“无限”服务。

title: Build iOS Apps on Linux and Windows (WSL)
summary:
This article announces `xtool`, a new open-source tool that enables building, signing, and deploying iOS apps from Linux and Windows (WSL), effectively replacing Xcode for some workflows even on macOS. It's SwiftPM-based and declarative, streamlining iOS development.

`xtool` facilitates building Swift packages into iOS apps, signing them, installing them, and interacting with Apple Developer Services programmatically. The author provides DocC articles and a tutorial on Swift Package Index to help users get started.

While `xtool` offers a core build-run-edit loop, some features are either infeasible or not yet implemented: Interface Builder support is unlikely due to SwiftUI's prevalence. Asset catalog support is planned but requires reverse engineering. Apple-proprietary macros need reverse engineering or WebAssembly support from Apple. App Extensions, LLDB debugging (especially with recent iOS changes), and App Store deployment are planned but require further development.

The author welcomes external contributions given the complexity of replicating Xcode's full functionality. `xtool` represents 8 years of work and aims to open up iOS development to more platforms.

虽然`xtool`提供了核心的构建-运行-编辑循环，但某些功能要么不可行，要么尚未实现：由于SwiftUI的普及，不太可能支持Interface Builder。计划支持资产目录，但需要进行逆向工程。Apple专有的宏需要逆向工程或Apple的WebAssembly支持。应用扩展、LLDB调试（尤其是最近iOS更改后的调试）以及App Store部署都已在计划中，但需要进一步开发。

鉴于复制Xcode完整功能的复杂性，作者欢迎外部贡献。`xtool`代表着8年的工作成果，旨在向更多平台开放iOS开发。

title: Fan Service
summary:
Tedu details their experience writing an ACPI WMI driver for ASUS laptops in OpenBSD to control fan speed, a feature accessible through hotkeys in Windows but non-functional in OpenBSD. The driver aims to replicate the fan control functionality, allowing users to switch between whisper and megablast modes and indirectly influence performance and battery life.

The process involved understanding ACPI and WMI, particularly how ASUS implements custom functionalities through non-standard ACPI methods identified by GUIDs. The author then develops a driver that reads the _WDG buffer to identify the relevant methods and responds to hotkey events. They debugged endianness issues and event handling, eventually discovering the correct argument to pass to the _WED method to receive event codes.

The author then implemented code to get and set device state, focusing initially on the keyboard backlight for testing and later on the fan profile. They resolved issues by comparing their code to the Linux driver and examining the laptop's ACPI code through `acpidump`. They discovered the correct device ID by analyzing the ASL code and incorporating a Vivobook specific define, enabling fan control.

The final result allows users to switch fan profiles, improving battery life and reducing noise at the cost of slower performance during intensive tasks. The driver works across different ASUS models. The author contrasts OpenBSD's driver organization, where related files are kept together, with Linux's more dispersed structure.

chinese_summary:

该过程涉及理解ACPI和WMI，特别是华硕如何通过GUID标识的非标准ACPI方法实现自定义功能。作者随后开发了一个驱动程序，读取_WDG缓冲区以识别相关方法，并响应热键事件。他们调试了字节序问题和事件处理，最终发现了传递给_WED方法的正确参数，以接收事件代码。

最终结果允许用户切换风扇模式，从而在牺牲高负载任务时的性能的情况下，提高电池续航能力并降低噪音。该驱动适用于不同的华硕型号。作者将OpenBSD的驱动程序组织方式（相关文件保存在一起）与Linux更分散的结构进行了对比。

title: Absolute Zero: Reinforced Self-Play Reasoning with Zero Data
summary:
This paper introduces "Absolute Zero," a novel Reinforcement Learning with Verifiable Rewards (RLVR) paradigm. It addresses the limitations of existing RLVR methods that rely on human-curated datasets for training reasoning abilities in large language models. The core problem is the potential scalability issues of relying on human supervision, especially when considering future AI surpassing human intelligence.

Absolute Zero overcomes this by enabling a single model to learn without *any* external data. It proposes a system, the Absolute Zero Reasoner (AZR), which self-evolves its training curriculum by proposing tasks tailored to maximize its own learning progress. AZR then improves its reasoning skills by solving these self-generated tasks. A key component is a code executor that validates both the proposed code reasoning tasks and their answers, providing a verifiable reward signal to guide the learning process. This creates a grounded, open-ended learning environment.

The authors demonstrate that AZR, trained entirely without external data, achieves state-of-the-art (SOTA) performance on coding and mathematical reasoning tasks, surpassing models trained with significant amounts of human-curated data. Furthermore, the approach is shown to be scalable across different model sizes and compatible with various model architectures. The research suggests a path towards developing more autonomous and capable AI systems that can learn and reason without human dependence.
chinese_title: 绝对零度：零数据下的强化自博弈推理
chinese_summary:
本文介绍了一种名为“绝对零度”的新型可验证奖励强化学习（RLVR）范式。它解决了现有RLVR方法依赖人工标注数据集训练大型语言模型推理能力的局限性。核心问题在于依赖人类监督的潜在可扩展性问题，尤其是在考虑到未来人工智能超越人类智能时。

“绝对零度”通过使单个模型无需*任何*外部数据即可学习来克服这一问题。它提出了一个系统，即“绝对零度推理器”（AZR），通过提出定制任务来最大化自身学习进度，从而自我进化其训练课程。然后，AZR通过解决这些自我生成的任务来提高其推理能力。一个关键组成部分是一个代码执行器，用于验证所提出的代码推理任务及其答案，从而提供可验证的奖励信号来指导学习过程。这创建了一个基于实际、开放式的学习环境。

作者证明，完全无需外部数据训练的AZR在编码和数学推理任务上实现了最先进（SOTA）的性能，超过了使用大量人工标注数据训练的模型。此外，该方法被证明可以跨不同模型尺寸进行扩展，并与各种模型架构兼容。这项研究表明，开发更自主、更有能力的人工智能系统，使其无需依赖人类即可学习和推理，是未来发展的方向。

title: A critical look at MCP
summary:
This article critically examines the Model Context Protocol (MCP), a standard intended to allow LLMs to interact with the world as agents. The author, who attempted to implement an MCP server in Go, expresses disappointment with the protocol's design and implementation, finding it lacking in mature engineering practices, documentation, and specification.

The core criticism focuses on the HTTP transport methods: HTTP+SSE and "Streamable HTTP." The author argues these methods are overly complex, attempting to emulate socket-like behavior (like stdio) without using WebSockets, which they believe is a more suitable and straightforward solution. They detail the numerous ways to initiate sessions, open SSE connections, and respond to requests within the HTTP transport methods, leading to increased complexity, potential for inconsistency, scalability concerns, and security vulnerabilities like session hijacking.

The author also criticizes the opinionated authorization requirements, where HTTP transport mandates OAuth2 while stdio allows for simpler API keys. They advocate for mimicking stdio's simplicity in the HTTP transport using WebSockets.

Furthermore, the article touches on the emergence of competing protocols like IBM's ACP and Google's A2A, suggesting they are largely redundant and could be implemented as tools within MCP. The author's overall sentiment is one of disillusionment, lamenting the industry's apparent haste in adopting immature technologies. They believe that optimizing for common use cases with robust solutions like WebSockets is preferable to complex corner-case solutions.
chinese_title: 对MCP的批判性审视
chinese_summary:
本文批判性地审视了模型上下文协议（MCP），该协议旨在使大型语言模型能够以代理的形式与世界互动。作者试图用Go语言实现一个MCP服务器，但对该协议的设计和实现表示失望，认为其缺乏成熟的工程实践、文档和规范。

核心批评集中在HTTP传输方法上：HTTP+SSE和“流式HTTP”。作者认为这些方法过于复杂，试图在不使用WebSocket的情况下模拟类似套接字的行为（如stdio），而他们认为WebSocket是更合适和直接的解决方案。他们详细描述了在HTTP传输方法中启动会话、打开SSE连接以及响应请求的多种方式，导致复杂性增加，可能出现不一致性，存在可扩展性问题，以及诸如会话劫持等安全漏洞。

作者还批评了其武断的授权要求，其中HTTP传输强制使用OAuth2，而stdio则允许使用更简单的API密钥。他们提倡在使用WebSocket的HTTP传输中模仿stdio的简单性。

此外，本文还提到了诸如IBM的ACP和Google的A2A等竞争协议的出现，暗示这些协议在很大程度上是多余的，并且可以作为MCP中的工具来实现。作者的总体情绪是幻灭，对行业明显急于采用不成熟的技术表示惋惜。他们认为，使用像WebSocket这样强大的解决方案来优化常见用例，比复杂的边缘案例解决方案更好。

title: A brief history of the numeric keypad
summary:
This article explores the history behind the differing numeric keypad layouts on telephones (1-2-3 at the top) and calculators (7-8-9 at the top). It traces the evolution of the numeric keypad back to the early 19th century with key-driven calculator machines like Jean-Baptiste Schwilgué's invention. The article then discusses the development of cash registers, specifically Dorr Felt's Comptometer which featured a 9-to-1 layout, and explores potential reasons for this design, including mechanical considerations and efficiency.

The Dalton adding machine in 1902 was a significant advancement, being the first to include the 0 key. Later, David Sundstrand's 3x3+1 layout (7-8-9 at the top) became the standard for calculators.

The article then shifts to telephones, highlighting that Bell Telephone Company experimented with push-button phones before the rotary dial. As phone numbers increased in length, AT&T conducted studies to determine the best keypad configuration for push-button phones.  Surprisingly, the calculator layout wasn't favored; users preferred a left-to-right, top-to-bottom layout (1-2-3 at the top).

Ultimately, the article suggests that design decisions are influenced by a combination of technology, ergonomics, user perception, and familiarity. The continued adherence to these historical layouts in modern digital applications is primarily due to user familiarity and convention rather than inherent efficiency. The article concludes with a timeline of key events in the development of numeric keypads.
chinese_title: 数字小键盘简史
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了电话（1-2-3在上）和计算器（7-8-9在上）数字键盘布局差异的历史渊源。文章追溯了数字键盘的发展历程，最早可追溯至19世纪初，以让-巴蒂斯特·施维尔格发明的键盘式计算器等机器为代表。随后，文章讨论了收银机的发展，特别是多尔·费尔特的康普托米特计算机，它采用了9到1的布局，并探讨了这种设计的潜在原因，包括机械考量和效率。

1902年的道尔顿加法机是一项重大进步，是第一台包含0键的机器。之后，大卫·桑德斯特兰德的3x3+1布局（7-8-9在上）成为计算器的标准。

文章随后转向电话，强调贝尔电话公司在转盘拨号之前就尝试过按钮电话。随着电话号码长度的增加，美国电话电报公司进行了研究，以确定按钮电话的最佳键盘配置。令人惊讶的是，计算器布局并未受到青睐；用户更喜欢从左到右、从上到下的布局（1-2-3在上）。

最终，文章认为设计决策受到技术、人体工程学、用户感知和熟悉程度等多种因素的影响。现代数字应用继续沿用这些历史布局，主要是因为用户的熟悉程度和习惯，而不是因为其固有的效率。文章最后给出了数字键盘发展中的关键事件时间表。

title: One-Click RCE in Asus's Preinstalled Driver Software
summary:
This article details a one-click Remote Code Execution (RCE) vulnerability found in ASUS's preinstalled DriverHub software. The author, "mrbruh," discovered that DriverHub, which manages driver updates, uses an unsecured RPC (Remote Procedure Call) mechanism. The software only checked if the "origin" header of requests contained "driverhub.asus.com," making it vulnerable to subdomain hijacking like "driverhub.asus.com.mrbruh.com."

The author identified several callable endpoints, including the dangerous `UpdateApp`, which allows downloading and executing files. While it validated ASUS signatures, the author cleverly exploited this by crafting a malicious AsusSetup.ini file that, when used with the legitimate, signed AsusSetup.exe (downloaded via `UpdateApp`), executed arbitrary code ("calc.exe" in the PoC). This was possible because AsusSetup.exe, when run silently, reads instructions from the ini file.

The vulnerability allows attackers to remotely execute code with administrative privileges, essentially taking control of the affected system with a single click. The author promptly reported the vulnerability to ASUS, who patched the software. CVEs (CVE-2025-3462 and CVE-2025-3463) were later assigned. While ASUS claimed it only affected motherboards, the author clarifies it affects any device with DriverHub installed. The author also notes the misleading CVE description and the fact that DriverHub installs bloatware along with drivers. Despite the ordeal, the author still has a non-functional onboard Wi-Fi adapter.
chinese_title: 华硕预装驱动软件中的一键RCE漏洞
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了一个在华硕预装的DriverHub软件中发现的一键远程代码执行（RCE）漏洞。作者“mrbruh”发现，负责驱动更新的DriverHub软件使用了一种不安全的RPC（远程过程调用）机制。该软件仅检查请求的“origin”标头是否包含“driverhub.asus.com”，使其容易受到子域名劫持，例如“driverhub.asus.com.mrbruh.com”。

作者识别出多个可调用的端点，包括危险的`UpdateApp`，该端点允许下载和执行文件。虽然它验证了华硕签名，但作者巧妙地利用这一点，通过制作一个恶意的AsusSetup.ini文件，该文件与合法的、已签名的AsusSetup.exe（通过`UpdateApp`下载）一起使用时，执行了任意代码（PoC中为“calc.exe”）。之所以可行，是因为AsusSetup.exe在静默运行时，会从ini文件中读取指令。

该漏洞允许攻击者以管理员权限远程执行代码，实际上只需单击一下即可控制受影响的系统。作者立即向华硕报告了该漏洞，华硕修复了该软件。后来分配了CVE（CVE-2025-3462和CVE-2025-3463）。虽然华硕声称它只影响主板，但作者澄清说它影响任何安装了DriverHub的设备。作者还指出，CVE描述具有误导性，并且DriverHub在安装驱动程序的同时还会安装臃肿软件。尽管经历了种种磨难，作者仍然有一个无法正常工作的板载Wi-Fi适配器。

title: What the hell are rare earth elements?
summary:
This article explains what rare earth elements are and why they're important, focusing on the US's loss of dominance in the industry to China.

Rare earth elements are 17 elements essential for many technologies like smartphones, EVs, and military equipment. While not geographically rare, extracting, processing, and refining them is complex, environmentally risky, and expensive.

The US once led in rare earth mining and processing, particularly through Molycorp's Mountain Pass mine. However, Molycorp shared processing blueprints with China, which then undercut Molycorp's prices due to cheaper labor and laxer environmental regulations. By the mid-1990s, China dominated the industry, ultimately closing the US's Molycorp mine.

China now controls ~60-70% of rare earth mining, ~90% of processing, and ~95% of permanent magnet production. China has also used its dominance politically, restricting exports to Japan in 2010 and recently limiting exports of rare earth processing technology.

The US is attempting to revive its rare earth industry with government subsidies to companies like MP Materials, aiming to increase domestic production and processing. However, China's existing capacity vastly outweighs current US efforts.

The article concludes by questioning whether there's sufficient market demand to justify significant investment in a US-based rare earth supply chain. The use of rare earths is smaller than other metals, and there are efforts to create magnets without them. Despite these challenges, rare earth elements remain a hot topic.
chinese_title: 稀土元素究竟是什么？
chinese_summary:
本文解释了什么是稀土元素以及它们为何重要，重点关注美国在该行业的主导地位如何丧失并落入中国手中。

稀土元素是17种对智能手机、电动汽车和军事装备等众多技术至关重要的元素。虽然它们在地质分布上并不稀少，但提取、加工和提炼过程复杂、环境风险高且成本昂贵。

美国曾经在稀土开采和加工方面处于领先地位，特别是通过莫利矿业公司的芒廷帕斯矿。然而，莫利矿业公司与中国分享了加工蓝图，中国随后通过更廉价的劳动力和更宽松的环境法规压低了莫利矿业公司的价格。到20世纪90年代中期，中国主导了该行业，最终导致美国的莫利矿业公司矿山关闭。

中国目前控制着约60-70%的稀土开采，约90%的加工以及约95%的永磁体生产。中国还将其主导地位用于政治目的，在2010年限制了对日本的出口，最近又限制了稀土加工技术的出口。

美国正试图通过政府补贴MP Materials等公司来复兴其稀土产业，旨在提高国内产量和加工能力。然而，中国现有的产能远大于美国目前的努力。

文章最后质疑是否存在足够的市场需求来证明对美国稀土供应链的大规模投资是合理的。稀土的使用量小于其他金属，并且正在努力开发不含稀土的磁铁。尽管面临这些挑战，稀土元素仍然是一个热门话题。

title: Show HN: Xenolab – Rasp Pi monitor for my pet carnivourus plants

title: Engineers develop wearable heart attack detection technology
summary:
University of Mississippi engineers have developed a wearable heart attack detection technology that is faster and more accurate than traditional methods. The technology consists of a lightweight, energy-efficient chip embedded in wearable devices that uses AI and advanced mathematics to analyze ECGs in real-time. The chip boasts a 92.4% accuracy rate in detecting heart attacks.

The device aims to shorten the time between the onset of a heart attack and treatment, potentially saving lives and minimizing permanent damage. Current heart attack diagnosis often requires a visit to a medical facility for an ECG or blood tests, which can be time-consuming. The wearable technology could allow for quicker detection and intervention.

Kasem Khalil, an assistant professor, and his team, including doctoral student Tamador Mohaidat and graduate student Md. Rahat Kader Khan, focused on designing a complete system, optimizing both hardware and software components. Mohaidat developed the artificial neural network, while Khan focused on the software. The researchers envision expanding the technology to detect other health problems like seizures and dementia.
chinese_title: 工程师开发可穿戴的心脏病发作检测技术

该设备旨在缩短心脏病发作到治疗之间的时间，从而可能挽救生命并最大限度地减少永久性损害。目前的心脏病发作诊断通常需要去医疗机构进行心电图或血液检查，这可能非常耗时。这种可穿戴技术可以更快地进行检测和干预。

title: Backdoor found in popular ecommerce components
summary:
Sansec discovered a widespread supply chain attack affecting numerous ecommerce stores due to backdoors injected into popular components from vendors Tigren, Meetanshi, and Magesolution (MGS) between 2019 and 2022. The backdoors, disguised as license checks (typically in `License.php` or `LicenseApi.php`), allow attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via the `adminLoadLicense` function, controllable through an `adminUploadLicense` function (unauthenticated in older versions, requiring a hardcoded key in newer versions).

The attack has been active since at least April 20th, impacting hundreds of stores, including a major multinational retailer. Sansec estimates that 500-1000 stores are running backdoored software.

Affected packages include various extensions related to Ajax functionality, image cleaning, cookie notices, shipping, Facebook integration, currency switching, Javascript deferral, out-of-stock notifications, and various MGS-branded modules (Lookbook, Store Locator, GDPR, Portfolio, Popup, etc.).

Sansec recommends checking stores using software from the mentioned vendors for the fake License file and removing it if found. The firm also asks for the sharing of original source code zip files (especially WeltPixel) for further analysis. Sansec's eComscan can detect the malware.

While Weltpixel was also found to have a backdoored version, its compromise could not be confirmed. MGS and Tigren have not removed the affected packages from their sites. Meetanshi acknowledged their server breach but denies their software was tampered with.
chinese_title: 热门电商组件发现后门
chinese_summary:

该攻击至少从4月20日开始活跃，影响了数百家商店，包括一家大型跨国零售商。 Sansec估计有500-1000家商店正在运行植入后门的软件。

title: Reverse engineering the 386 processor's prefetch queue circuitry
summary:
This article reverse engineers the prefetch queue circuitry of the Intel 386 processor to understand its performance-enhancing techniques. The prefetch queue, a 16-byte buffer, fetches instructions ahead of time to avoid processor stalls.

The article highlights several key circuits:

*   **Incrementer:** Incrementer, responsible for incrementing the "Advance Instruction Fetch Pointer," utilizes a Manchester carry chain combined with a carry skip circuit for high-speed addition. The Manchester carry chain quickly computes carries using a chain of transistor switches, while the carry skip circuit allows carries to jump over blocks of 1s, further accelerating the process.
*   **Limit Check:** Compares the fetch pointer against the code segment limit to prevent out-of-bounds prefetching. It uses a dynamic logic circuit with XOR gates for fast comparison and a precharged equality bus to indicate a match.
*   **Data Shifting Network:** Aligns data from memory, handling cases where a 32-bit value is split across two rows of the prefetch buffer.
*   **Sign Extension Circuitry:** Extends signed 8-bit or 16-bit values to 32 bits as needed.

The article demonstrates how the 386's designers employed clever circuit design techniques like dynamic logic, precharging, and asymmetrical inverters to optimize performance within a constrained layout. The use of dynamic logic reduces power consumption, and the Manchester carry chain and carry skip techniques optimize the speed of the incrementer. The layout shows how circuits are repeated across 32 bits, each fitting into a specific width.

title: Why the Apple II Didn't Support Lowercase Letters (2020)
summary:
This article details the reasons behind the Apple II's initial lack of lowercase letter support, as explained by Steve Wozniak himself. Wozniak's primary constraint was a severe lack of funds. He needed a keyboard for his TV Terminal project, which preceded the Apple computer. The cheapest option was a $60 (equivalent to around $333 today) uppercase-only keyboard, a significant expense that strained his budget.

When Wozniak conceived the Apple I, he integrated his existing TV Terminal with a microprocessor and RAM. Adding lowercase support later would have required a substantial rewrite of his hand-assembled BASIC interpreter, a time-consuming and risky task without access to a timeshare assembler (which he couldn't afford). He had to rewrite all his code, which was handwritten into binary.

While Wozniak personally favored lowercase letters, Steve Jobs was indifferent to the feature. Ultimately, the decision not to include lowercase letters in the Apple I and II stemmed from Wozniak's financial limitations and the practical difficulties of retrofitting the existing system. As a result, all 8kB of code in the Apple II was written entirely by him, making it impossible to add lowercase easily. The article emphasizes the role of necessity in driving innovation, suggesting that Wozniak's financial constraints ultimately spurred the development of the Apple I and II.

title: The History and Legacy of Visual Basic
summary:
This article details the origin story of Visual Basic, tracing its roots back to Alan Cooper's "Tripod," a shell construction set for Windows created in 1988. Cooper's demo of Tripod impressed Bill Gates, who acquired the project. Cooper and his team then rewrote Tripod from scratch, renaming it "Ruby."

However, Ruby was ultimately excluded from Windows 3.0 due to internal political conflict within Microsoft. Gates, inspired by the interactive design of Ruby, envisioned integrating its visual programming frontend with BASIC. He tasked the Business Languages Group to create this visual programming language, codenamed "Thunder."

The Thunder team, led by young developers and aided by Michael Geary from Cooper's team, faced the challenge of transforming Ruby's shell construction kit into a full-fledged programming environment. A key change involved replacing Ruby's visual graph messaging system with BASIC.  They borrowed Omega's Embedded Basic code editor and event model.

Despite initial plans for a quick project, it took 18 months of development to create the first version of Visual Basic. Although Cooper's original vision of a user-customizable shell was not realized, his work on Tripod/Ruby laid the foundation for one of the most popular programming environments of the 1990s.

title: The State of SSL Stacks
summary:
This article discusses the challenges and considerations surrounding SSL library choices for reverse proxies like HAProxy, particularly in light of OpenSSL's evolution. OpenSSL, once the industry standard, faced performance regressions with its 3.0 version, leading to a reevaluation of SSL strategies. The transition posed performance bottlenecks and compatibility challenges, forcing organizations to weigh performance against security updates.

The paper explores alternative SSL libraries: BoringSSL (bleeding-edge features, but unstable API), LibreSSL (focus on security, with API changes), WolfSSL (lightweight, compatibility layer for easier porting), and AWS-LC (backward compatible, performance-focused). The choice depends on functional requirements (TLS versions, QUIC support, certificate management), performance considerations (handshake efficiency, CPU core utilization, energy consumption), and maintenance requirements (security patching, backward compatibility).

HAProxy's SSL feature set was designed around the OpenSSL API, so any replacement must offer compatibility or functional parity. While HAProxy supports several libraries, including LibreSSL, WolfSSL, and AWS-LC, integration can vary in features and complexities. Newer protocols like QUIC are essential for widespread adoption. Ultimately, the best SSL library choice involves a careful trade-off between performance, features, maintainability, and the specific needs of the software product. The article highlights the complexity of navigating the modern SSL ecosystem and the ongoing need for adaptation and innovation.

title: Comparison of C/POSIX standard library implementations for Linux
summary:
This article provides a detailed comparison of C/POSIX standard library implementations for Linux, focusing on musl, uClibc, dietlibc, and glibc. The comparison covers various aspects, including bloat, behavior on resource exhaustion, performance, ABI and versioning, algorithms used, features, target architectures, build environment, and security/hardening.

**Key takeaways:**

*   **Bloat:** musl and dietlibc generally exhibit less bloat compared to uClibc and glibc in terms of library size and overhead.
*   **Resource Exhaustion:** The article highlights how each library handles resource exhaustion scenarios like memory allocation failures and thread-local storage.
*   **Performance:** The performance comparison reveals trade-offs across different libraries, with glibc often showing faster execution in some areas and musl excelling in others.
*   **ABI and Versioning:** musl offers a stable ABI and atomic upgrades, while glibc provides backwards compatibility and symbol versioning.
*   **Algorithms:** The choice of algorithms used in functions like substring search and sorting differs across implementations, affecting performance.
*   **Features:** The article details feature support, including C standards compliance, POSIX threads, locale support, and Linux extensions.
*   **Target Architectures:** All libraries support common architectures (x86, x86\_64, ARM), but vary in support for less common ones.
*   **Security:** The article touches on each library's approach to preventing stack smashing, heap corruption, and handling UTF-8 decoding securely.

The article concludes that each library has its strengths and weaknesses, with the best choice depending on specific application requirements and priorities.

title: The Emacs Widget Toolkit
summary:
This article argues that Emacs' current reliance on GTK for its GUI is a mistake and explores potential directions for improving Emacs' widget toolkit. The author criticizes GTK for its instability, backwards incompatibility, lack of configurability, and limited benefits for Emacs. The PGTK port, intended to address Wayland compatibility, is deemed insufficient, offering few advantages and introducing several disadvantages.

The core problem is that GTK doesn't provide the level of control and customization Elisp needs to create a truly integrated and powerful graphical experience within Emacs. Emacs doesn't fully utilize GTK's capabilities, and GTK's limitations hinder the development of features like a more functional file dialog, a customizable toolbar, improved minibuffer integration, and smooth scrolling.

The article then explores potential solutions, focusing on the importance of retaining the advantages of plain text: universality, standard interaction modalities, and the ability to apply Emacs' text-editing functions to various data representations. The author suggests that a successful Emacs widget toolkit must provide uniform navigation verbs, mirroring the richness of Emacs' text-based navigation, including concepts like moving by words, lines, and S-expressions. The goal is to replicate the power of Emacs' text-based interaction within a graphical environment, enabling users to navigate and interact with GUI elements as effectively as they currently interact with text.

summary:

However, the article expresses concern that recent changes to the FDA vaccine approval process, spearheaded by Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. (RFK Jr.), may jeopardize the vaccine's approval. The new policy mandates placebo-controlled trials for all new vaccines, which could create hurdles for vaccines like mRNA-1083, especially since there isn't an approved mRNA-based flu vaccine currently.

The article also highlights RFK Jr.'s past anti-vaccination stances and skepticism towards mRNA vaccines, despite a lack of scientific evidence supporting his claims. Moderna doesn't expect approval before 2026 due to the FDA's request for effectiveness data against the flu. The article questions whether even this timeline is realistic given the current political climate and RFK Jr.'s influence within the Department of Health and Human Services. title: Not a three-year-old chimney sweep (2022)
summary:
This article debunks the claim that viral footage from 1933 shows a three-year-old chimney sweep working in Germany. The author argues the scene was staged for entertainment or publicity, not an actual instance of child labor.

The author identifies the location as Berlin, Germany, around 1929-1930, based on architectural details and magazine appearances of the same figures. While acknowledging historical instances of child labor in chimney sweeping, the article highlights that such practices were illegal in Germany at the time the footage was taken. German law specifically prohibited children under 10-13 working as chimney sweeps, and this was strictly enforced.

Several clues suggest the staged nature of the footage: the child's miniature tools (ladder, brush, coring ball) are impractical for real work, chimney sweeping technology had advanced to eliminate the need for children to climb chimneys, and it was common to dress children as chimney sweeps for good luck and photo opportunities.

The article further identifies the father and son as Otto and Horst Böhnke, based on newspaper and magazine mentions discovered by online sleuths. They were seemingly a popular subject for photographers and newsreels. The author concludes that Horst was likely just coming along for fun or for a photo shoot and was not genuinely working as a chimney sweep. The search for more information about the Böhnke family continues.

title: Arduino is at work to make bio-based PCBs
summary:
This Arduino blog post announces their involvement in the Desire4EU project, a European initiative focused on developing bio-based printed circuit boards (PCBs) as a sustainable alternative to traditional PCBs. The project aims to reduce the environmental impact of electronics manufacturing and disposal.

The Desire4EU project, running from 2024 to 2028, involves researchers and engineers from multiple European countries and aims to create bio-based multilayer PCBs without sacrificing functionality or performance. Prototypes using a PLA-flax composite as a flame-retardant replacement for fiberglass and epoxy have already been successfully manufactured for Arduino Nano and UNO boards.

The project is taking a holistic approach, considering the entire lifecycle of the boards. This includes lower soldering temperatures for reduced energy consumption during manufacturing, compatibility with standard surface-mounted technology (SMT), and optimized layouts for improved yield and reliability. A Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) is being conducted to quantify waste reduction, CO2 savings, and the potential for bio-leaching to recover copper from used PCBs. They estimate that 90% of the traditional FR4 substrate can be replaced with sustainable materials.

Existing Arduino board designs can be adapted with minimal changes, making adoption easier. Arduino plans to distribute 1,000 beta boards with LoRa® wireless connectivity in April 2026 for testing in real-world applications. They invite testers, educators, and innovators to participate in the program. Readers can find additional details in the scientific paper and on the official Desire4EU website.

title: Intel: Winning and Losing
summary:

They launched the Atom CPU family with the Bonnell microarchitecture, targeting the low-power segment, and the Nehalem microarchitecture (Core i7) for high-performance computing, abandoning traditional northbridge/southbridge architectures.

By 2009, Craig Barrett resigned as chairman, and Intel unveiled its 32nm process. 2010 saw the release of the Nehalem/Westmere microarchitecture, and Intel ventured into the SSD market with the Intel SSD 310. The PC market boomed, and Intel's revenue and income increased significantly.

In 2011, Intel recognized growing competition in various markets (PC, server, embedded), particularly from ARM in low-power devices. They launched Sandy Bridge, improving performance and integrating the GPU on-die. Light Peak evolved into Thunderbolt, offering high-speed data transfer. A significant move was the acquisition of McAfee for $7.68 billion, reflecting Intel's attempt to diversify into software and address growing security concerns. Finally, Intel announced its 22nm process, introducing FinFET technology (3D transistors) which represented a major step forward in transistor design.

title: Detect and crash Chromium bots
summary:
This article humorously explores using a Chromium bug to detect and crash bots by exploiting a vulnerability triggered by `iframe.contentWindow.open()` with specific arguments. The bug causes headless Chromium browsers used by tools like Puppeteer and Playwright to crash.

The author presents a simple JavaScript snippet, `botCheckMate()`, that leverages this bug. If the script doesn't crash the browser, it's assumed to be a human user. While this seems like an ideal bot detection method, the article strongly cautions against using it in production.

The drawbacks include:

*   **Poor User Experience:** Triggering unexpected popups for human users is disruptive and degrades trust.
*   **Noisy Signal:** It's a blatant, disruptive signal that doesn't allow for subtle monitoring.
*   **Coupled Detection and Response:** Crashing the browser is an immediate and irreversible action, limiting flexibility in how bots are handled (e.g., shadowbanning, flagging).
*   **Limited Context:** Client-side execution restricts access to server-side data, such as bot signatures or allow lists.
*   **Easily Circumvented:** Bot developers can easily override or sanitize the `open()` method to avoid the crash.

The article advocates for detection signals that are quiet, don't impact performance or user trust, allow for contextual decision-making, and are resilient to adaptation. While the crash method is amusing and effective in controlled environments, it fails on all these fronts and is unsuitable for real-world deployment.

title: Alone Together: Disconnection Is Our Generation's Black Death
summary:
Josef Chen argues that our generation is facing a new "Black Death" - disconnection and loneliness - that is as deadly as the historical pandemic. He critiques the tech industry's obsession with biohacking and gene editing for longevity, pointing out that these pursuits often overshadow more fundamental needs and societal issues. Referencing Harvard's 75-year Study of Adult Development, Chen highlights the crucial role of human connection in long-term health and fulfillment, noting that chronic loneliness activates harmful physiological responses in the body.

Chen argues that increased reliance on technology and AI further erodes social interaction, leading to emotional vacancy even in shared spaces. He contrasts this with the historical Black Death, where the cause was invisible, and now, the cause (disconnection) is everywhere, yet unrecognized.

Chen is building his own robotics-powered restaurant with a focus on human connection, which he sees as a crucial element, rather than automating it. He was surprised to find the elderly loved his restaurant as they felt someone cared about them. He supports this with neuroscience, citing research demonstrating that live conversation has a profound impact on brain activity.

While emphasizing the importance of connection, Chen also stresses the need for standards in other areas of health, like sleep, nutrition, and environmental factors. He references Neko Health and ZOE as examples of companies prioritizing both advanced health technology and human connection. He concludes that true longevity isn't about avoiding death, but about living a life worth living, emphasizing the importance of shared experiences and genuine human interaction.

title: Adaptive Hashing
summary:
This article discusses adaptive hashing, a technique to improve the performance and robustness of general-purpose hash tables. Traditional hash table theory focuses on worst-case asymptotic cost with randomly chosen hash functions, but in practice, constant factors and fixed hash functions are more relevant. Adaptive hashing aims to improve these factors by adapting the hash function to the actual keys used, optimizing for fewer collisions and better cache efficiency.

The author describes how SBCL's built-in hash tables were modified to implement adaptive hashing. For EQ hash tables, the algorithm starts with linear search, then transitions to a single-shift hash function optimized for memory allocator behavior (perfect for arithmetic sequences of keys). If collisions persist, it reverts to the previous default SBCL EQ-hash function and then, if necessary, to Murmur, a more robust general-purpose hash.

For EQUAL hash tables (composite keys), the focus is on reducing the cost of the hash function itself. Adaptive hashing initially only hashes the first and last few characters of strings or the first few elements of lists, increasing the limit if collisions become too frequent.

The goal is to achieve speed improvements in common cases while maintaining robustness in others. The article mentions a paper containing more details on the implementation and performance results.
chinese_title: 自适应哈希
chinese_summary:
本文讨论了自适应哈希，这是一种提高通用哈希表性能和鲁棒性的技术。传统的哈希表理论侧重于随机选择哈希函数时的最坏情况渐近成本，但实际上，常数因子和固定哈希函数更具相关性。自适应哈希旨在通过使哈希函数适应实际使用的键，优化以减少冲突和提高缓存效率来改善这些因素。

作者描述了如何修改 SBCL 的内置哈希表以实现自适应哈希。对于 EQ 哈希表，该算法首先从线性搜索开始，然后过渡到针对内存分配器行为优化的单移位哈希函数（非常适合键的算术序列）。如果冲突持续存在，它将恢复到以前的默认 SBCL EQ 哈希函数，然后在必要时恢复到 Murmur，一种更强大的通用哈希。

对于 EQUAL 哈希表（复合键），重点是降低哈希函数本身的成本。自适应哈希最初仅对字符串的前几个和最后几个字符或列表的前几个元素进行哈希处理，如果冲突变得过于频繁，则会增加限制。

目标是在常见情况下实现速度提升，同时在其他情况下保持鲁棒性。本文提到了包含有关实现和性能结果的更多细节的论文。

title: The Deathbed Fallacy (2018)
summary:
The article "The Deathbed Fallacy" argues that using the regrets of people on their deathbeds as a guide for living a fulfilling life is flawed. The author coins this "The Deathbed Fallacy," and dissects it based on three key reasons.

First, a deathbed state is not representative of life as a whole. What someone wants at the very end may not correlate with what would have made them happiest throughout their life. Second, people often misremember or misunderstand their past selves. The author uses a personal anecdote about teenage priorities to illustrate how present-day judgment can be inaccurate and even detrimental. What might seem like a "wrong" choice in hindsight could have been the right choice in that specific context. Finally, the experiences and challenges faced by those nearing death, who often grew up in different eras, are not directly applicable to younger generations living in a vastly changed world.

The author criticizes those who preach the "Deathbed List" as often being privileged individuals who have already achieved material success and can now afford to prioritize higher-order needs. They judge their past selves for focusing on work, when that work was essential to reaching their current comfortable position. Conversely, those who focus solely on authenticity and a carefree life without first securing basic needs often struggle.

Instead of relying on deathbed regrets, the author advises focusing on happiness research, personal reflection, and making decisions that align with current needs and goals, even if those decisions involve hard work and sacrifices. He advocates for building a stable foundation and prioritizing well-being *now*, rather than worrying about the potential regrets of a future, possibly ungrateful, self.
chinese_title: 临终谬误 (2018)
chinese_summary:
文章《临终谬误》认为，将临终者的遗憾作为过上充实生活的指南是有缺陷的。作者创造了“临终谬误”这一概念，并基于三个关键原因对其进行了剖析。

首先，临终状态不能代表人生的全貌。一个人在生命尽头想要的东西，可能与其一生中最快乐的时光并不相关。其次，人们常常错误地记忆或理解过去的自己。作者用一个关于青少年时期的个人轶事来说明，现在的判断可能是不准确甚至是有害的。事后看来似乎是“错误”的选择，在特定的背景下可能是正确的选择。最后，那些接近死亡的人所面临的经历和挑战，他们通常成长于不同的时代，并不直接适用于生活在剧变世界中的年轻一代。

作者批评那些鼓吹“临终清单”的人，认为他们往往是已经获得物质成功的特权阶层，现在可以优先考虑更高层次的需求。他们评判过去的自己专注于工作，而那些工作对于他们达到目前舒适的地位至关重要。相反，那些只关注真实性和无忧无虑的生活，而没有首先保障基本需求的人，往往会陷入困境。

作者建议，不要依赖临终遗憾，而应专注于幸福研究、个人反思，并做出符合当前需求和目标的决定，即使这些决定涉及辛勤工作和牺牲。他提倡建立一个稳定的基础，并优先考虑*现在*的福祉，而不是担心未来可能出现的、甚至是不知感恩的自己的潜在遗憾。

title: Lianas are taking over the rainforests, and it's visible from space
summary:
A "liana pandemic" is sweeping through tropical rainforests, threatening their carbon storage capacity and biodiversity. Research from Leiden University shows liana prevalence is increasing by 10-24% per decade in tropical forests worldwide. Lianas, like "tapeworms," steal resources from trees, increasing tree mortality and suppressing forest regeneration. In heavily infested areas, carbon storage can decline by as much as 95%, comparable to deforestation.

The researchers attribute this surge to rising atmospheric CO₂ levels, which benefit lianas more than trees because lianas don't invest in structural support and require less energy to produce leaves. They can quickly climb to the canopy, block sunlight, and outcompete trees.

Importantly, the study reveals that lianas are now detectable from space because their leaves reflect more light and infrared radiation and lie flatter than tree leaves. This understanding allows for the development of targeted techniques to map their spread and impact globally.

Despite the negative impacts, the researchers advise against widespread liana removal due to their ecological role in providing fruit and habitat for certain species. Instead, they advocate for halting climate change as the best way to slow the liana expansion. The research highlights the urgent need to address climate change to protect the vital role of rainforests in climate regulation and biodiversity.
chinese_title: 藤本植物正在侵占热带雨林，从太空可见。
chinese_summary:
一场“藤本植物疫情”正在席卷热带雨林，威胁其碳储存能力和生物多样性。莱顿大学的研究表明，全球热带森林中藤本植物的普遍程度每十年增加10-24%。藤本植物就像“绦虫”，窃取树木的资源，增加树木死亡率并抑制森林再生。在受严重侵扰的地区，碳储存量可能下降高达95%，与森林砍伐相当。

研究人员将这种激增归因于大气中二氧化碳水平的上升，这比树木更有利于藤本植物，因为藤本植物不需要投入结构支撑，并且生产树叶所需的能量更少。它们可以迅速爬到树冠，阻挡阳光，并与树木竞争。

重要的是，该研究表明，现在可以从太空探测到藤本植物，因为它们的叶子比树叶反射更多的光和红外辐射，并且更加扁平。这种理解有助于开发有针对性的技术，以在全球范围内绘制其蔓延和影响图。

尽管存在负面影响，但研究人员建议不要广泛移除藤本植物，因为它们在为某些物种提供水果和栖息地方面具有生态作用。相反，他们主张阻止气候变化是减缓藤本植物扩张的最佳方式。该研究强调了解决气候变化的紧迫性，以保护雨林在气候调节和生物多样性方面的关键作用。

title: Adventures in Imbalanced Learning and Class Weight
summary:
This article explores the impact of class weighting in imbalanced binary classification problems. The author investigates why the common "inverse proportion" class weighting often fails to improve performance and attempts to derive an optimal weighting strategy from first principles.

The analysis focuses on the tradeoff between false positives and false negatives, represented by a curve defined by a parameter 'p'.  The author uses weighted binary cross-entropy loss with a weight 'α' for the rare positive class to control the tradeoff point. They derive an equation linking 'α', the class prevalence 'β', and 'p' to the operating point (x, z) on the tradeoff curve.

The author then optimizes for the F1-score, expressing it in terms of 'α', 'β', 'p', 'x', and 'z'. Numerical analysis reveals that inverse proportion weighting rarely significantly improves performance compared to unweighted training, and can sometimes even be detrimental.

A rudimentary experiment using scikit-learn supports these theoretical findings, showing minimal performance boost from optimal class weights. The author emphasizes the importance of problem-specific characteristics like the tradeoff curve shape, label noise, and the relative cost of different errors in determining appropriate class weights.

An update highlights that inverse proportion weighting *does* optimize for balanced accuracy. This emphasizes the crucial role of metric selection: F1-score and balanced accuracy prioritize different error types, necessitating alignment of technical choices with domain requirements.
chinese_title: 不平衡学习与类别权重探险
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了类别权重在不平衡二元分类问题中的影响。作者研究了为何常见的“反比例”类别权重往往无法提高性能，并试图从第一性原理推导出最优的权重策略。

分析侧重于假阳性和假阴性之间的权衡，该权衡由参数“p”定义的曲线表示。作者使用加权二元交叉熵损失，对稀有的正类赋予权重“α”来控制权衡点。他们推导出一个将“α”、类别比例“β”和“p”与权衡曲线上的工作点 (x, z) 联系起来的公式。

然后，作者针对F1分数进行优化，并用“α”、“β”、“p”、“x”和“z”表示它。数值分析表明，与未加权训练相比，反比例权重很少能显著提高性能，有时甚至会产生不利影响。

一个使用scikit-learn的初步实验支持了这些理论发现，表明从最优类别权重中获得的性能提升微乎其微。作者强调了问题特定特征的重要性，例如权衡曲线形状、标签噪声以及不同错误的相对成本，这些特征决定了适当的类别权重。

更新强调，反比例权重*确实*优化了平衡准确率。这突出了指标选择的关键作用：F1分数和平衡准确率优先考虑不同的错误类型，因此需要将技术选择与领域要求对齐。

title: The Ecstatic Swoon
summary:
Robert D. Zaretsky's essay explores the "Stendhal syndrome," named after the author Henri Beyle (Stendhal), who experienced intense emotional and physical reactions to art in Florence. The syndrome manifests in tourists overwhelmed by the city's art, sometimes requiring medical attention.

Zaretsky contrasts this intense reaction with the often superficial way people engage with art today, observing that museum visitors typically spend little time with each piece, often prioritizing quick consumption and social media documentation over genuine appreciation. He notes that tourists now often "do" the great sites of history and art less to see them than to be seen by them, more to add to our cultural capital than to our personal growth.

Stendhal himself criticized the overwhelming experience of art tourism, as seen in the Louvre, and championed a more personal and emotional engagement with art. He believed that the purpose of art is to evoke feeling and that true appreciation requires surrendering to the artwork rather than analyzing it.

Zaretsky emphasizes Stendhal's view that artists themselves must be passionate individuals capable of conveying deep emotions through their work, exemplified by his admiration for artists like Correggio, whom he saw as capable of eliciting profound feeling in the viewer. The essay ultimately advocates for a more immersive and emotional approach to experiencing art, echoing Stendhal's belief that art should move us profoundly.

title: Slow software for a burning world
summary:
Bonfire is approaching its 1.0 release, but instead of a typical launch, the team is reflecting on their unique, "slow software" approach focused on care, deep listening, and collective stewardship, contrasting it with Silicon Valley's "move fast and break things" mentality. They emphasize values like trust, consent, community, and environmental sustainability, which are often sacrificed in the pursuit of profit and rapid scaling.

Inspired by the Zapatista "caracol," Bonfire prioritizes decentralized governance, flexibility, and community involvement. Key features include modular design where communities govern "flavors" of Bonfire, configurable defaults, custom roles, and granular permission controls. The aim is to prioritize real relationships over simplified approaches, centering marginalized needs.

To resist capture and ensure long-term community autonomy, Bonfire uses AGPL licensing, multi-layered modularity, community-governed "flavors," and avoids VC funding and advertisements. They're experimenting with sociocratic circles and participatory funding models to maintain resilience.

Bonfire federates with Mastodon and the wider fediverse, emphasizing autonomy through connection, allowing communities to maintain their unique cultures and practices. The project aims to prevent user lock-in by promoting data migration freedom.

The "campground" test instance serves as a living laboratory for co-design and experimentation, inviting active participants to shape the platform's development, governance, and culture. The Bonfire team encourages community organizers, activists, and builders to join the conversation, propose features, contribute feedback, and help shape the project's future. They want to build interconnected spaces based on care, autonomy, and collective power, and invite others to join them.

Bonfire即将发布1.0版本，但团队并未采取典型的发布方式，而是反思其独特的“慢软件”理念，即专注于关怀、深度倾听和集体管理，这与硅谷“快速行动，打破常规”的心态形成对比。他们强调信任、共识、社群和环境可持续性等价值观，而这些价值观往往在追求利润和快速扩张时被牺牲。

受萨帕塔运动“蜗牛”的启发，Bonfire优先考虑去中心化治理、灵活性和社区参与。主要功能包括模块化设计，社区可以管理Bonfire的“风味”，可配置的默认设置、自定义角色和细粒度的权限控制。其目标是优先考虑真实的联系，而非简化的方法，并以边缘化的需求为中心。

为了抵制捕获并确保长期的社区自主性，Bonfire采用AGPL许可、多层模块化、社区管理的“风味”，并避免风险投资和广告。他们正在试验社会计量圈和参与式融资模式，以保持韧性。

Bonfire与Mastodon和更广泛的联邦宇宙联合，强调通过连接实现自主性，允许社区保持其独特的文化和实践。该项目旨在通过促进数据迁移自由来防止用户锁定。

title: In praise of grobi for auto-configuring X11 monitors
summary:
This article praises the `grobi` program for automatically configuring X11 monitors, specifically addressing the challenges of using a Dell 32-inch 8K monitor (UP3218K) after waking from suspend-to-RAM. The author previously relied on a custom script and manual `xrandr` commands, which were unreliable and inconvenient.

`grobi` solves this by listening for X11 RandR output change events and automatically running `xrandr` based on a configuration file. The author provides a sample `~/.config/grobi.conf` file tailored for their monitor setup, demonstrating how to define rules for specific monitors and their desired configurations, including resolution and positioning. The configuration allows for atomic `xrandr` calls for better compatibility with certain graphic cards.

The author also shares details on how to install and enable `grobi` on Arch Linux and how to check its status using `systemctl` and `journalctl`.

Furthermore, the article includes a bonus section describing the author's suspend-to-RAM setup using `zleep`, a wrapper around `rtcwake` and `systemctl suspend`, which also integrates with a myStrom smart plug to cut power to the monitor completely, saving energy.  The author provides the Go source code for `zleep` and the shell script used to turn the monitor back on after resume, leveraging `grobi` for automatic configuration. Finally, the author gives a sample output for the `zleep` program, and briefly explains that it is more ideal to use `grobi` due to the authors familiarity.

title: WebGL Water (2010)
summary:
This is a demonstration of WebGL Water, a real-time water rendering engine created by Evan Wallace in 2010. The demo showcases advanced graphics techniques achievable through WebGL, including raytraced reflections and refractions, analytic ambient occlusion, heightfield water simulation, soft shadows, and caustics.

The demo allows users to interact with the water in several ways: drawing ripples, rotating the camera, pausing the simulation, moving a sphere that interacts with the water, adjusting the light direction, and toggling gravity.

The underlying implementation relies on specific WebGL extensions. The heightfield water simulation utilizes the `OES_texture_float` extension, while the caustics rendering depends on the `OES_standard_derivatives` extension. The demo requires a modern graphics card and up-to-date drivers for optimal performance. If the demo fails to run, a YouTube video is provided as an alternative. The tile texture used in the demonstration is credited to zooboing on Flickr.

title: Private Japanese lunar lander enters orbit around moon ahead of a June touchdown
summary:
In May 2025, Japan's private lunar lander, Resilience, developed by Tokyo-based ispace, successfully entered lunar orbit. This marks a significant step toward the lander's planned touchdown in the first week of June. The mission follows successful lunar landings by two U.S. companies, Firefly Aerospace (the first private outfit to successfully land a spacecraft on the moon) and Intuitive Machines. ispace previously experienced a failed lunar landing in 2023.

Resilience carries a mini rover equipped with a scoop designed to collect lunar soil samples for analysis, along with other scientific experiments. The launch of Resilience was conducted by SpaceX in January, with Firefly Aerospace's lander also onboard.

Ispace has officially declared the start of the countdown to the lunar landing. The article highlights the growing trend of private companies participating in lunar exploration, with Japan aiming to join the ranks of nations and private entities that have successfully reached the moon's surface.
